Implementation in R: 
------------------------------------------

```{r}
library(MASS)
trainset <- iris[-example_row, ] 
fit.lda <- lda(Species ~ ., data=trainset, prior=c(1/3, 1/3, 1/3)) 
pred <- predict(fit.lda, iris[example_row, ])
round(pred$posterior, 3)
```
